column5: I have a buddy who is headed up to the area in September looking for a trophy walleye more than likely fishing the Saskatchewan River above Tobin. Looking for any info on presentation, etc.. I've found the following: -Better success when releasing water (same as our Missouri River) - Rigging with live bait (leeches) -Plan trip around a full moon -the Vanity Cup is 9-30-10-1 Any additional insight would be greatly appreciated!
been there 3 times in the 90's my pb was 13.8 lbs my buddys was 15.5lbs not a numbers lake, pm if u want more details
